dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependent_to.description:
HAL is a structure to efficiently store and index multiple genome
alignments and ancestral reconstructions. HAL is a graph-based
representation which provides several advantages over matrix/block-based
formats such as MAF, such as improved scalability and the ability to
perform queries with respect to an arbitrary reference or subtree.
dependent_to.name: hal

description:
sonLib is a compact C/Python library for sequence analysis in
bioinformatics.
name: sonlib

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
